item.title: Publications
item.description: 2018 S J Johnston, P J Basford, C S Perkins, H Herry, F P Tso, D Pezaros, R D Mullins, E Yoneki, S J Cox and J Singer, Commodity Single Board Computer Clusters and Their Applications, Future Generation Computer Systems, 2018 [doi] J Singer, H Herry, P J Basford, W Hajji, C S Perkins, F P Tso, D Pezaros, R D Mullins, E Yoneki, S J Cox and S J Johnston, Next Generation Single Board Clusters, Proceedings of the IEEE/IFIP Network Operations and Management Symposium, Taipei, Taiwan, April 2018 [pdf]

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Research Associate at School of Computing Science, University of Glasgow, working on Federated RaspberryPi μ-Infrastructure Testbed (FRμIT). My works are on Edge Compute and Distributed System. I received Ph.D. (2014) from the University of Edinburgh, B.Sc. (2002) and M.Sc. (2004) from Universitas Indonesia.
